DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the drug-drug interaction between amlodipine/losartan and rosuvastatin in healthy male volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating a Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Between Amlodipine/Losartan and Rosuvastatin
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age between 19 and 55 Signed informed consent Presence of medical history or a concurrent disease Has a history of hypersensitivity to IP ingredients
